aws_cluster_tunnel: aws ssm start-session --profile {profile} --region {region} --target $(aws ec2 describe-instances --region eu-west-1 --filters 'Name=tag:Name,Values=bastion-ssm-*' 'Name=instance-state-name,Values=running' --query 'Reservations[*].Instances[*].[InstanceId]' --output text --profile {profile})  --document-name AWS-StartPortForwardingSessionToRemoteHost --parameters '{{"host":["{cluster}"],"portNumber":["443"], "localPortNumber":["10443"]}}'
